originalText.text: As both a participant in the course and a model I recommend this course 100%. Incredibly educational. The hands on portion is great to learning exactly what you need to do to become proficient at injecting and making your clients happy ðŸ˜Š

text.text: As both a participant in the course and a model I recommend this course 100%. Incredibly educational. The hands on portion is great to learning exactly what you need to do to become proficient at injecting and making your clients happy ðŸ˜Š

originalText.text: The best thing about this school is the 1:1 interaction with a board certified provider. The trainee usually injects 5-6 models while the trainer is right next to them. The training is performed in the providers office so there is a great comfort level. I would definitely recommend Cosmetic Medical Training.

text.text: The best thing about this school is the 1:1 interaction with a board certified provider. The trainee usually injects 5-6 models while the trainer is right next to them. The training is performed in the providers office so there is a great comfort level. I would definitely recommend Cosmetic Medical Training.

originalText.text:
As opened my own medical aesthetic practice last year, Cosmetic Medical Training provided me with top class, one-on-one training in my office.
Christina Pawlish was my trainer.  Christina took the time to go over all aspects of injecting neurotoxins and fillers w/me, from facial anatomy to technique.  She was patient, professional and gave me the confidence to start injecting without fear.  Cosmetic Medical Training and Christina Pawlish are the absolute best.  I would recommend them without hesitation.  Worth more than the cost!

originalText.text: I was a a participant in the learning session and was impressed by the education in which I decided to become a model which will help me with my patient experience when administering Botox

originalText.text: We just had our botox training in our office. The whole experience was smooth and convenient. Both my doctor and I got trained. And they came within a week of our booking. Highly recommend.
